p: The fatty acids obtained from the MSK have many similarities with cocoa butter in terms of properties, such as solid fat content, triglycerides, crystallization, and melting point; therefore, it used to replace cocoa butter. Premium-grade mango seed fat and oils (extracted by modern technologies like supercritical fluids) have premium characteristics and, along with palm stearin, can be used in the preparation of temperature-resistant chocolates in tropical countries [ 87].
